#labels Featured
=="Family Tree"==

Something like this:
{{{
<VBA 1.72> -- <VBA-RR> v19 -- v21 -- v22 -- v23 -- (still active)
                        \
                         -- v20 -- v24-alpha -- (undecided)
                                   /
<VBA 1.80b> -- <VBA-M series> -- <VBA-"ReR"> v24 -- (active)
}}}

Version numbers:
 * *Original series:* _1.x.y(.z)_
 * *VBA-M:* _only SVN revision numbers_
 * *VBA-RR:*
  * *pre v23.3 (?):* _1.7.2.560_
  * *v23.x:* _7.23.y.z_
  * *v24-alpha:* _7.24.y.z_
 * *VBA-"ReR":* _8.24.y.z_ (z is likely to be 0 due to bugs...)

Note: This might be inaccurate though.

Movies are more likely to be sync-able with VBA-RR versions that are on the same horizontal line. There are always exceptions, nevertheless.
